text: Point of care medical information summaries are defined as "web-based medical compendia specifically designed to deliver predigested, rapidly accessible, comprehensive, periodically updated, and evidence-based information" to healthcare providers. == Products == *DynaMed *UpToDate == See also == *Clinical decision support system == References == Category:Evidence-based medicine Category:Medical databases Category:Medical websites Category:Online databases Category:Health informatics
title: Point of care medical information summary
